TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectingProviderEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了值事件处理程序。The class supplies values to the event handler. 你创建事件处理程序以在运行时选择的角色提供程序。You create a event handler to select the role provider at run time. 类所引发事件时任一方法或方法类名。The class raises the event when either the method or the method of the class is called. 你使用属性来检索有关登录的用户的信息。You use the property to retrieve information about the logged-in user. 若要检索其角色信息通过非默认角色提供程序，将设置为所需的角色提供程序名称属性要使用对象。To retrieve role information through a non-default role provider, set the property to the name of the role provider that you want the object to use. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用对象，请检查用户名并设置要使用的角色提供程序。The event handler uses the object to check the user name and to set the role provider to use. 事件处理程序绑定到中的事件`Application_Start`的 Global.asax 文件的方法。The event handler is bound to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/vb/Global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于检索用户角色的角色提供程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the role provider to use for retrieving the user's roles.

value.span: 用于获取用户角色的角色提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the role provider that is used to get the user's roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性来设置期间的角色提供程序事件。You use the property to set the role provider during the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用对象，请检查用户名并设置要使用的角色提供程序。The event handler uses the object to check the user name and to set the role provider to use. 事件处理程序绑定到中的事件`Application_Start`的 Global.asax 文件的方法。The event handler is bound to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/vb/Global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property User As IPrincipal
public: property System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ User { System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取已经过身份验证的用户。

value.span: 包含已经过身份验证的用户的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the authenticated user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性来检索有关在用户的信息事件。You use the property to retrieve information about the user during the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用对象，请检查用户名和设置要使用的角色提供程序。The event handler uses the object to check the user name and set the role provider to use. 事件处理程序绑定到中的事件`Application_Start`的 Global.asax 文件的方法。The event handler is bound to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SelectingProviderEventHandler/vb/Global.asax#1)]
